result.title: CFGrabber
result.content:
Hello everybody, I was trying to learn some python and as a exercise I made this python script:

https://github.com/alex-mercer/cfgrabber

You provide the script a Codeforces handle and it will download all of the accepted submissions of the user. I've also added an option to store gym submissions if you enter the password. Hope you guys like it and please share any suggestion you have.
